companies.title: 4th Year College Student
tasks: Currently studying software development with a focus on web application design and development.
Collaborated with peers on various projects to design and develop websites and applications that process, analyze, and render data effectively.
Developed foundational skills in both front-end and back-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and ReactJS.
Participated in team projects to implement code quality, optimize performance, and ensure responsive design.
Engaged in continuous learning to maximize application efficiency, operability, and flexibility.
Gained hands-on experience through academic projects and internships, working closely with cross-functional teams.
